title: release.r57
body:
We plan to create release.r57 using weekly.2011-04-27 as a base.

This issue is for tracking issues that have to be fixed
in the release.

NOT EVERY BUG IS WORTH BACKPORTING FOR THE RELEASE.

To add a new backport request, create a new issue with
a title like

    release.r57: backport CL 1234056

with an appropriate description and then make this issue
blocked on the new one.
